apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji beautifully depicts a loving couple, with the woman on the left and a person with a dark skin tone on the right, embracing with a vibrant red heart floating between them. Apple's signature glossy 3D shading imbues the heart with a luminous glow, while soft gradients define the figures, suggesting a tender connection. The smooth, rounded edges of the figures and the heart convey a sense of warmth and deep affection, making it a perfect symbol for romantic relationships and heartfelt declarations of love shared on Apple devices.
